Allright, the phone line decided to start working again, so I'm back. Sorry 
for being out the whole day, it wasn't my fault.

Also, I'm a bit confuzed about the hostage situation. Did Koj fire or not? 
And if Logo is going to be out till wednesday, and since she's a major part 
of this, I think we should pause that particular scene till she's back.

I don't have enough time to post right now, but I will next morning. 
Goodnight everyone.
